text: Porphyrobacter cryptus is an aerobic and slightly thermophilic bacteria from the genus of Porphyrobacter which has been isolated from a hot spring from the Alafache Spa in Portugal. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Porphyrobacter cryptus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2003
title: Porphyrobacter cryptus
